TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomLabelsCollection extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel>

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabelsCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> objects, which in turn represent the custom labels that an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object can use. This class is exposed as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.CustomLabels%2A> collection property of an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object.
> [!NOTE] > You can automatically populate the entire label row of an axis with custom <xref:System.DateTime> labels using any <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabelsCollection.Add%2A> method definition that includes a `DateTimeIntervalType` argument.
The <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Count%2A> property indicates the total number of items in the collection, and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.
A enumeration value that determines the interval type.
Docs.summary: Adds multiple objects of type to the collection. Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabelsCollection.Add%2A> method creates and initializes <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> objects for the entire first label row of an axis with <xref:System.DateTime> labels of the specified type.
The `labelsStep` parameter determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A> method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add (double fromPosition, double toPosition, string text);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add(float64 fromPosition, float64 toPosition, string text) cil managed

Docs.param: The minimum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.
The maximum value of the axis range to which the label is applied.
The label text.
Docs.summary: Adds a object to the collection, using the given axis range and text.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Adds one custom label to the first label row of the relevant axis. No label mark is used.
If a custom label is used anywhere in the first label row, no labels are automatically generated for that first row.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A> method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.
A enumeration value that determines the unit of measure for the labelsStep parameter.
A value that determines the format of the custom label. For more information, see Date and Time Format Strings.
Docs.summary: Adds multiple objects to the collection. Populates the entire first row of an axis with labels with the specified format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method creates and initializes <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel> objects for an axis' entire first label row with <xref:System.DateTime> labels of the specified type.
The step determines how often the custom labels will be drawn, and optional label formatting can be specified as well.
> [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.RecalculateAxesScale%2A> method must be called prior to calling this particular method definition.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add (double fromPosition, double toPosition, string text, int rowIndex, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add(float64 fromPosition, float64 toPosition, string text, int32 rowIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle) cil managed

Docs.param: The minimum value of the axis range the label is applied to.
The maximum value of the axis range the label is applied to.
The label text.
The label row index.
A enumeration value that specifies the tick mark style used for the label.
Docs.summary: Adds a custom label to the collection, using the given axis range, text, row index and marking style.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format, int rowIndex, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle);

.method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, string format, int32 rowIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.
A enumeration value that determines the unit of measure for the labelsStep parameter.
The label text format.
The label row index.
A enumeration value that specifies the tick mark style used for the label.
Docs.summary: Adds multiple custom labels to the collection. The labels will be labels with the specified interval type, text format, row index and marking style.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CustomLabel Add (double fromPosition, double toPosition, string text, int rowIndex, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.GridTickTypes gridTick);

The maximum value of the axis range the label is applied to.
The label text.
The label row index.
A enumeration value that specifies the tick mark style used for the label.
A enumeration value that specifies the grid tick type used for the label.
Docs.summary: Adds a custom label to the collection, using the given axis range, text, row index, marking style and grid tick type.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (double labelsStep, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, double min, double max, string format, int rowIndex, System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle);

.method public hidebysig instance void Add(float64 labelsStep, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType intervalType, float64 min, float64 max, string format, int32 rowIndex, valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LabelMarkStyle markStyle) cil managed

Docs.param: A value that determines how often the custom labels will be drawn.
A enumeration value that determines the unit of measure for the labelsStep parameter.
The minimum value of the axis range.
The maximum value of the axis range.
The label text format.
The label row index.
A enumeration value that specifies the tick mark style used for the label.
Docs.summary: Adds multiple custom labels to the collection. The labels will be labels with the specified interval type, and will be generated for the axis range that is determined by the and arguments.
